name: Netflix - YouTube skin player
description: Clean and modern YouTube player for Netflix. :) It also changes the icons and animations of the player. This style is beautiful. I hope you like it as much as I do.
additional_info:
February 2, 2018: Updated the "Back to Browse" button to work with the site's new version.

October 11, 2017: Included the rewrote style for the new Netflix player.

May 16, 2017: Date created.

Thumb's up if you like it. If it does not work it is because the site changed and I have to adjust/rebuild the style. People only rate when this happens, I adjust/rebuild the style within a few days, but their bad rating stays, misleading the users about the quality of the sytle.

discussions.name: Works well, is fully functional and good looking
This is the nicest Netflix style
Perfect, Thank you! I should donate.
Love the userstyle, but it breaks the customer support page
